alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:56PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marin and southeastern Sonoma Counties through 345 PM PST... At 255 PM PST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Petaluma, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Petaluma, San Rafael, Novato, San Anselmo, Sonoma, Fairfax, San Geronimo, Tomales, Lucas Valley-Marinwood, Black Point-Green Point, Point Reyes Station, Dillon Beach, Kentfield, Ross, Inverness, El Verano, Santa Venetia, Woodacre, Lagunitas-Forest Knolls and Temelec. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
